tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE retention_policies (    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    retention_period INT NOT NULL,    regulation_type TEXT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE policy_logs (    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,    policy_id UUID NOT NULL,    action TEXT NOT NULL,    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    policy_id INT
);
